title: Circuit Similarity Map
description: Interactive 2D visualization showing electrical circuits organized by content similarity using dimensionality reduction on circuit embeddings
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Circuit Analysis
Data Visualization
Machine Learning
Dimensionality Reduction
Circuit Classification
learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of circuit similarity map
Explore circuit similarity map through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of circuit similarity map to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on circuit similarity map
